document.full_text: a tornado ravaged a tiny oklahoma town on thursday, killing two people, while in arkansas 80-mile-an-hour winds caused damage that killed at least five people, officials said.
document.title: a warning, and 68 minutes later a killer touches down
lines_and_colors: a tornado ravaged a tiny oklahoma town on thursday, killing two people, while in arkansas 80-mile-an-hour winds caused damage that killed at least five people, officials said.
